information.overview: There are 4 tabs in this app:
people: Show list of members who joined this activity
You can add, edit and delete the person
The name of a person must not be duplicated
expenses: Show list of expenses that someone paid for all or just a group member
You can add, edit and delete expense
You can only add expense when there are at least 2 members in the activity
balance: Show the total expense and the amount corresponding amount of each person
If the money is positive, it is the amount that person will get back
If it is negative, that is the amount of that person have to pay back
outstanding: The app calculate in a smart way and suggest the minimum number of transactions everyone has to do in order to pay/get the money back after the activity
